name: DIGANTA SWARAJ FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Diganta Swaraj Foundation aims to bring sustainable progress in Maharashtra through participatory planning with sound technical expertise and advocacy. Our  staff comes with a rich experience of 10 years of working in the tribal areas of Maharashtra and Chhattisgarh, for which we have received recognition for our work since its inception.The techniques proposed by Diganta Swaraj Foundation for Rainwater harvesting have been accredited by Dr. Rajendra Singhji, the Waterman of India. As a result we are now able to provide technical guidance to different rural and tribal areas in Konkan Division supported by State Government of Maharashtra.
